thread.title: Reader: Now We've Got Two Generations of A$$holes Going to the Movies
thread.title_full: Reader: Now We've Got Two Generations of A$$holes Going to the Movies | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Reader: Now We've Got Two Generations of A$$holes Going to the Movies
text:
YouTube Our post about rude movie theater behavior struck a chord with a lot of readers.
Some cited specific behavior that didn't come up in the post, including no one's favorite, seat-kicking.
Related Stories Movie Theater Behavior Is Getting Worse â€” and Here's Proof Others lamented a general lack of cinema etiquette.
Take the following leader, who thinks such actions are passed down from parents to kids.
Rick Hall writes:
Parents have finally grown up from the little brats that they were in their youth. Guess what their kids are like now? So now we have two generations assholes roaming the country. I don't go to movies now. Why pay that price to watch a movie with other idiots when I can wait and watch it for nothing in the comfort of my own home? Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
